Cards.Slashing: Long Gash: Normal Damage and 8 bleed. A successful Heal check cuts the bleeding in half, rather than ending it.
Cards.Bludgeoning: Crushed Trachea: Normal Damage, and target cannot breathe or speak. DC 20 Heal check ends condition.
Cards.Piercing: Elbow Pierced: Double Damage, and target drops whatever is being held (1 item).
Cards.Magic: Vulnerability: Double Damage and if the spell did elemental Damage, the target is now vulnerable to that element for 3 rounds.

Cards.Slashing: Severed Spine: Double Damage and 3d6 Dexterity Damage (Fortitude halves).
Cards.Bludgeoning: Crushed Intestines: Normal Damage and 1d4 Constitution bleed (DC 15 Fortitude negates, save each round).
Cards.Piercing: Lodged In The Bone: Double Damage and 2 Bleed. This bleed requires a DC 20 Heal check to stop.
Cards.Magic: I Love You, Man: Normal Damage, and target is Charmed for 3 rounds (Will negates).

Cards.Slashing: Pain And Simple: Double Damage, and 2d6 nonlethal Damage.
Cards.Bludgeoning: Bone Masher: Normal Damage and either 1d3 Dexterity Damage and halve speed (Leg) or 1d3 Strength Damage (Arm). Limb is useless until healed.
Cards.Piercing: Punctured Lung: Double Damage and target begins to drown 3 rounds later. DC 20 Fortitude save each round to end effect.
Cards.Magic: Hypnotic Link: Double Damage and you may give the target 1 Suggestion (As the spell, Will negates.

Cards.Slashing: Rupture Abdominal Cavity: Double Damage and 1 Constitution Bleed.
Cards.Bludgeoning: Collapsed Lung: Normal Damage and the target is Staggered for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Piercing: Nerve Cluster: Normal Damage and target is Stunned for 1d6 rounds (Fortitude save each round to act).
Cards.Magic: Transposition: Double Damage and you and the target switch places.

Cards.Slashing: Lean Into The Blow: Triple Damage, but you drop your weapon.
Cards.Bludgeoning: Ruptured Spleen: Normal Damage and 1d6 Bleed. This bleed can only be cured with Magic.
Cards.Piercing: Muscle Severed: Normal Damage and 1d6 Dexterity and 1d6 Strength Damage.
Cards.Magic: Funny Bone: Double Damage and target spends 1 round laughing (As Hideous Laughter spell, Will negates).

Cards.Slashing: Surprise Opening: Double Damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty.
Cards.Bludgeoning: Crunch: Double Damage and target is Nauseated for 1 round (Fortitude negates).
Cards.Piercing: Forearm Piercing: Double Damage and target is Disarmed.
Cards.Magic: Allergic Reaction: Double Damage and 1d4 Damage to a random ability score.

Cards.Slashing: Across The Eyes: Normal Damage and target is permanently Blinded (Reflex negates).
Cards.Bludgeoning: Pimp Slap: Normal Damage and target Dazed for 1d4 rounds.
Cards.Piercing: Cheek Pierced: Normal Damage and 1d4 Bleed. Target gains 50% spell failure chance for verbal spells until healed.
Cards.Magic: Turned Around: Double Damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round.

Cards.Slashing: Nerve Slice: Double Damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round.
Cards.Bludgeoning: Broken Ribs: Double Damage and target cannot heal naturally for 1d4 days.
Cards.Piercing: Spinal Tap: Normal Damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks, and ability checks for 1d4 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Arcane Blast: Double Damage and 2d6 random energy Damage (Reflex halves).

Cards.Slashing: We're Got A Bleeder: Normal Damage and 2d6 Bleed.
Cards.Bludgeoning: Nighty Night: Normal Damage and target is Unconscious for 1d4 rounds (Fortitude negates).
Cards.Piercing: Painful Poke: Double Damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round.
Cards.Magic: Siren Song: Double Damage or Triple Damage to Giants, Humanoids, and Monstrous Humanoids.

Cards.Slashing: Armor Damage: Double Damage and normal Damage to target's armor.
Cards.Bludgeoning: Terrible Bruise: Double Damage and 2d6 Nonlethal Damage.
Cards.Piercing: Knockback: Double Damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away.
Cards.Magic: Draining Spell: Double Damage and target randomly loses one spell or one use of a spell-like ability.

Cards.Slashing: Terrible Gash: Double Damage and 1 Charisma Drain.

Cards.Magic: Excruciating: Normal Damage and target is Sickened for 1d6 rounds.

Cards.Slashing: Gut Slash: Double Damage and 1d4 Bleed. Target cannot Swallow Whole.

Cards.Magic: Splash Spell: Normal Damage and Half Damage to all adjacent targets.

Cards.Slashing: Flay: Normal Damage plus 1d6 Strength Damage.

Cards.Magic: Corrosive: Double Damage, if Acid spell, target takes 2d6 Acid Damage for 1d4 rounds.

Cards.Slashing: Throat Slash: Normal Damage and 2d6 Bleed. Target cannot talk or breathe while bleeding.

Cards.Magic: Life Leech: Normal Damage and 1 Negative Level (Fortitude negates after 1 day).

Cards.Slashing: Knockback: Double Damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away.

Cards.Magic: Frozen: Double Damage. If Cold spell, target takes 1d4 Dexterity Damage.

Cards.Slashing: Cut Straps: Double Damage and double Armor check Penalty until fixed (DC 15 Craft).

Cards.Magic: Electrocuted: Double Damage. If Electricity spell, target Stunned for 1d4 rounds.

Cards.Slashing: Overhand Chop: Double Damage and 1d4 Bleed.

Cards.Magic: Knockback: Double Damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away.

Cards.Slashing: Missing Digits: Normal Damage and target loses 1d3 fingers and takes 1 Constitution and Strength drain (Fortitude negates).

Cards.Piercing: Stinger: Normal Damage and target is Sickened for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Arcane Goo: Normal Damage and target is Entangled (DC 20 Strength or Escape Artist to be freed).

Cards.Slashing: Shield Cleave: Double Damage and Normal Damage to target's Shield.

Cards.Piercing: Vulnerable Shot: Normal Damage and target takes 1d4 ability Damage of your choice.
Cards.Magic: Wild Surge: Normal Damage and Normal Damage of a random energy type.

Cards.Slashing: Weapon Strike: Normal Damage and Normal Damage to target's weapon.

Cards.Magic: Nerve Damage: Normal Damage and target is Slowed for 1d6 rounds.

Cards.Magic: Returning Spell: Double Damage and spell is not lost.

Cards.Magic: Planar Rift: Normal Damage and target sent to a random plane (Will Negates).

Cards.Slashing: Swing Through: Double Damage and one free attack against an adjacent foe at the same bonus.

Cards.Melee: Overextend: You provoke an Attack of Opportunity from all adjacent opponents.
Cards.Ranged: Aching Back: You are Fatigued.
Cards.Natural: Upset Tummy: You are Sickened for 1d4 rounds
Cards.Magic: Backblast: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

Cards.Melee: Critical Mistake: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
Cards.Ranged: Whoops!: You are knocked Prone.
Cards.Natural: Out Of Position: You cannot use this attack for 1 round.
Cards.Magic: Mind Drain: You take 1d4 points of Damage to Intelligence, Wisom, or Charisma (determined randomly).

Cards.Melee: Off-Balance: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.

Cards.Natural: Broke A Nail: You take 1d4 points of damage and you cannot use this attack until healed.
Cards.Magic: Power Drain: You lose one prepared spell or spell slot (determined randomly).

Cards.Melee: Pin Prick: You take 1 point of Bleed.

Cards.Natural: Fist Meets Face: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critial hit.
Cards.Magic: Distance Rift: You are teleported to the nearest square adjacent to the target.

Cards.Natural: I Bit My Tug: You take 1 point of Bleed.

Cards.Natural: Stop Hitting Yourself!: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

Cards.Magic: Weakened: You take a -2 penalty to all of your spell DCs for 1d4 minutes.

Cards.Melee: Catch Your Breath: You can only take a move action next round.

Cards.Natural: Got Too Close: Your attack hits the target but the target may start a grapple against you for free.
Cards.Magic: You Made Him Stronger: The target gains a +8 Enchantment Bonus to Strength for 1d4 rounds.

Cards.Melee: All Or Nothing: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.
Cards.Ranged: Close To The Ear: You are Deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check).
Cards.Natural: Pins And Needles: You are Sickened for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Why Me?: You provoke Attacks of Opportunity from all threatening foes.

Cards.Melee: Surrounded By Foes: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
Cards.Ranged: Insecure: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls for 1d4 days or until you score a critical hit.
Cards.Natural: Great Roar: You are Deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check).
Cards.Magic: Error!: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

Cards.Melee: Armor Smash: Your attack deals damage to your armor.
Cards.Ranged: Lost Grip: You can only take a move action next round.
Cards.Natural: Battered: You take a -2 penalty on skill checks and saves for 1d4 hours.
Cards.Magic: Unexpected Blast: The spell affects all targets within 30 feet of you. You are immune to this effect.

Cards.Natural: Overexertion: You are Exhausted (Fortitude negates).

Cards.Natural: Bone Bruise: You take 1d2 points of Constitution Damage.
Cards.Magic: You Made Him Bigger: Target increases by one size category for 1d4 rounds.

Cards.Melee: This Is Bad: You take an amount of Bleed equal to your Strength Bonus (minimum 1).

Cards.Natural: Whirlwind Of Shame: Your attack deals damage to all targets adjacent to you except the original target.
Cards.Magic: Jumbled Components: You can only take a move action next round.

Cards.Melee: On The Receiving End: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
Cards.Ranged: In The Line Of Fire: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
Cards.Natural: Head, Meet Wall: You are Dazed for 1d3 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Can You Hear Me Now?: You are Deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check).

Cards.Melee: Bohemian Earspoon: You are Deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check).
Cards.Ranged: Lowered Guard: You provoke Attacks of Opportunity from all threatening foes.
Cards.Natural: Ferocious Fumble: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
Cards.Magic: The Magic Is Gone: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

Cards.Melee: Hand It Over: Your target gains possession of your weapon (Reflex negates).
Cards.Ranged: Broken: Your weapon is destroyed (Reflex negates). Magic weapons use their own save bonus.
Cards.Natural: Smash The Floor: You kick up dust that Blinds you for 1d4 rounds (Fortitude negates).
Cards.Magic: You Made Him Faster: The target is Hasted for 1d4 rounds.

Cards.Melee: Funny Bone: You drop whatever is in your off hand.
Cards.Ranged: Not My Pony: Your attack hits the nearest allied animal or mount.
Cards.Natural: Bad Headbutt: You are Stunned for 1 round (Fortitude negates).
Cards.Magic: Caster's Block: You cannot cast this spell for 24 hours.

Cards.Melee: Bent: You take a -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until it is repaired (DC 20 Craft check).
Cards.Ranged: Double Miss: You use twice as much ammunition on this attack.
Cards.Natural: Caught Your Attack: The target may attempt to Trip, Bull Rush, or Overrun you (target's choice).
Cards.Magic: Left Reeling: You are Stunned for 1 round.

Cards.Melee: Shield Crash: Your attack deals damage to your shield.
Cards.Ranged: Everything You Got: You are Exhausted (Fortitude negates).
Cards.Natural: He's Sharp: You take 1d6 points of Damage + Your Strength Modifier.
Cards.Magic: You Made Him Tougher: The target gains DR 5/- for 1d4 rounds.

Cards.Melee: Better To Give: Your attack damages you instead. Use your target's Strength Modifier.
Cards.Ranged: Weapon Jam: If using a projectile weapon it does not function. Spend 1 standard action to clear.
Cards.Natural: Sneeze!: You are Dazed for 1 round.
Cards.Magic: Hit By The Ugly Forest: You take 1 point of Charisma Bleed.

Cards.Melee: Cutter: You take 1 point of Strength Bleed.
Cards.Ranged: Um, Oops: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
Cards.Natural: Ingrown Nail: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.
Cards.Magic: Clatto Verata Necktie: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

Cards.Melee: Winded: You are Exhausted (Fortitude negates).
Cards.Ranged: Bad Alignment: You take a -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until repaired (DC 20 Craft Check).
Cards.Natural: He Bit Your Fist: The target deals Bite damage to you.
Cards.Magic: Poor Trade: The attack hits but you must lose a spell or slot of the highest available level (your choice).

Cards.Melee: Stuck: Your weapon is stuck in a nearby surface. DC 20 Strength check to free it.
Cards.Ranged: Archer's Elbow: You take a -2 penalty on all ranged attack rolls for 1d4 minutes.
Cards.Natural: Off Balance: You can only take a move action next round.
Cards.Magic: Spell Shield: The target gains SR equal to 11 + Your Caster Level for 1d6 rounds.

Cards.Melee: Attack The Darkness: All your enemies have Concealment from you for 1d4 rounds.
Cards.Ranged: Aim Carefully Next Time: For 3 rounds, you must spend a full-round action to make a single attack.
Cards.Natural: Brutal Collision: Your attack hits, but you are Stunned for 2 rounds (Fortitude save reduces the Stun to 1 round).
Cards.Magic: Power Transfer: The highest-level spell effect on you is transferred to your target.

Cards.Melee: Wait! What?: You are Confused for 1 round.
Cards.Ranged: Don't Hit Me!: For 3 rounds, you take an additional -2 penalty on ranged attacks for each ally in melee combat with your target.
Cards.Natural: Pinched Nerve: If you had reach greater than 5 feet, it is reduced to 5 feet for 3 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Mental Slip: On their next turn, your target may give you one Suggestion.

Cards.Melee: Wrong End: If you're using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 points of damage and 1 point of Bleed.
Cards.Ranged: Phantom Wind: You compensate for a breeze which isn't there. You take a -2 penalty on ranged attack rolls for 3 rounds.
Cards.Natural: Overthink It: Your target's Armor and Natural Armor Bonuses are doubled against you for 3 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Power Down: You take 1 point of Intelligence Bleed.

Cards.Melee: Vibration: If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you take 1d3 points of Strength Damage and drop your weapon.
Cards.Ranged: Recoil: You move backward 1 square and fall Prone.
Cards.Natural: Punctured Foot: You take 1d3 points of damage and your speed is halved until healed.
Cards.Magic: Weak-Minded Fool: You take 1 point of Wisdom Bleed.

Cards.Melee: Second Thought: You are Sickened for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Ranged: Mix It Up: You are unable to make ranged attacks for the next 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Natural: Hangnail: If this was a claw attack, slam, or unarmed strike, you cannot use that attack for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Magical Vacuum: 1d3 spell effects active on you are Dispelled (determined randomly).

Cards.Melee: Eat Dirt: You fall Prone and are Blinded for 1d3 rounds (Fortitude negates).
Cards.Ranged: Overcompensate: All targets with Cover gain an additional +4 bonus to AC against you for 3 rounds.
Cards.Natural: That Tastes Awful!: If this was a bite attack, you are Nauseated for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Energy Transfer: Lose one randomly determined spell or spell slot. Your target can cast this spell next round.

Cards.Melee: You Meant To Do That: Move 10 feet in a random direction and provoke Attacks of Opportunity as normal.
Cards.Ranged: Misjudged The Distance: All attack rolls beyonf the first range increment have triple the normal distance penalty for 3 rounds.
Cards.Natural: Not The Weak Point: Your enemy's armor takes 1d6 points of damage. You take 1d6 points of damage and cannot use that attack for 1d3 rounds.
Cards.Magic: How Did That Happen?: A Stinking Cloud appears, centered on you.

Cards.Melee: Who Was That: You are Dazed for 1d3 rounds.
Cards.Ranged: Seeing Double: All your attacks have a 50% miss chance for 1 round.
Cards.Natural: Broken Tooth: You have -2 penalty on attack rolls for 1d6 minutes.
Cards.Magic: Fragmented Magic: 1d4+2 Mirror Images spring up around your target. These images last for 1 minute or until destroyed.

Cards.Melee: Bad Grip: Your weapon deals Nonlethal Damage for the next 3 rounds.
Cards.Ranged: Huh?: You are Confused for 1 round.
Cards.Natural: Eye Strain: You are Blinded for 1 round.
Cards.Magic: Blastoff: You are thrown 1d6x10 feet into the air (or in a random direction if flying)(Will negates).

Cards.Melee: Punt: Your weapon flies 2d6 squares in a random direction.
Cards.Ranged: So Much Blood: You are Sickened for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Natural: Unintentional Move: Move 10 feet in a random direction and provoke Attacks of Opportunity as normal.
Cards.Magic: It's Sparkly: You are Blinded for 1 round.

Cards.Melee: Parry! Dodge! Spin! Thrust!: You are Dazed for 1 round.
Cards.Ranged: Torn Tendon: You take 1 point of Dexterity Bleed.
Cards.Natural: Stinging Failure: You take 1d6 points of Nonlethal Damage and a -2 penalty on attack rolls with that attack for 1d4 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Cursed: You take a -4 penalty on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks. This effect can only be cured with Remove Curse.

Cards.Melee: Catastrophic Failure: You fall Unconscious for 1d6 rounds (Will negates).
Cards.Ranged: Overthrow: If attack was made with a thrown weapon, the weapon travels 5 times its range increment in a random direction.
Cards.Natural: Don't Pick At It: You take 1 point of Constitution Damage.
Cards.Magic: Magical Smackdown: You automatically fail your next saving throw.

Cards.Melee: Pointy End Goes There: You take 1 point of Constitution Damage.
Cards.Ranged: Tunnel Vision: For the next 3 rounds, you have a +1 bonus to attack rolls, but you are Flat-Footed.
Cards.Natural: We Have A Wiener: You fall Unconscious for 1d6 rounds (Will negates).
Cards.Magic: Wild Magic: Roll twice on the Rod of Wonder table.

Cards.Melee: Broken Haft: Your weapon loses Reach. You have a -4 penalty on attack rolls with it until repaired (DC 20 Craft check).
Cards.Ranged: All Thumbs: You lose your Dexterity bonus on attack rolls for 3 rounds.
Cards.Natural: Whiff: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
Cards.Magic: This Is Hard: You take 1 point of Constitution Damage.

Cards.Melee: Go For The Eyes: You are Blinded for 1 round.
Cards.Ranged: Pinch In The Parts: You take 1d6 points of damage.
Cards.Natural: Winds Of Change: You threaten no squares for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Magic: Now I See You...: Your target becomes Invisible for 1d4 rounds.

Cards.Melee: Fog Of War: You threaten no squares for 1d6 rounds.
Cards.Ranged: Bull's Eye: Your shot ricochets and hits you near the eye. You are Blinded for 1 round.
Cards.Natural: Jam A Finger: Your target takes Normal Damage, but you take Double Damage.
Cards.Magic: Nothing To Fear: You are Shaken for 2d4 rounds.
